Detailed Description

Generates HTML code based on a template and given variables.

Version:
0.4.1

checkTemplate (  ) 

Checks the view's template exists, and throws an exception otherwise.

Returns:
bool True if the template exists and is readable, false otherwise.
Exceptions:
{@link MissingTemplateException} Thrown when the template cannot be found/read.

importHelper ( $  helper,
$  constructOptions = array() 
)

Loads a helper class into the register.

This method works best when the helper directory is in the autoload path.

Parameters:
string $helper The namespaced name of the helper to load.
Returns:
bool True if the given helper could be found and loaded, false otherwise.
Since:
0.4.1
